0110001000010011 0101110010111000 1 -> sum: 1011111011001100, cout: 0
0000110101010100 0101101011010110 1 -> sum: 0110100000101011, cout: 0

1001010011010110 1010010001110000 0 -> sum: 0011100101000110, cout: 1
0111011010101101 1110111010011000 0 -> sum: 0110010101000101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
